amendment.description: Amendment requires executive agencies to provide specific information to Congress when an agency awards a "no-bid" contract using funds from the Iraq Relief and Reconstruction Fund.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to require executive agencies to provide specific information to Congress when an agency awards "no-bid" contract using funds from the Iraq Relief and Reconstruction Fund.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Slaughter amendment (A014) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A014) offered by Ms. Slaughter.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Slaughter amendment (A014) Agreed to by voice vote.
